tickets.title: Unit Test Suite
tickets.deferred_reason: Achieved 83% coverage (288 passing tests). Remaining 7% gap consists of defensive exception handlers in command modules that would require complex mocking scenarios with diminishing returns. All critical paths covered: client (98%), config (96%), formatters (97%), main (97%). Core acceptance criteria met: 95%+ JSON-RPC client, 95%+ config management, 90%+ formatters, all mock-based tests, pytest fixtures, coverage reporting. Recommend deferring additional exception path testing until integration testing phase where these paths can be tested more naturally.

tickets.title: Custom Pattern Framework with Hooks System

state_history.note: All acceptance criteria met: 114 tests passing, all patterns tested, streams tested, graph algorithms validated

*Created: 2025-10-12T00:00:00Z*
*Updated: 2025-10-23T18:14:02.120449Z*

tickets.title: Implement COMPASS Pydantic Models
tickets.notes:
Pydantic models must use Python 3.12+ modern typing:

- Built-in generics: `list[int]`, `dict[str, Any]`
- Union operator: `int | None` instead of `Optional[int]`
- Strict validation for all COMPASS metrics

---

*Updated: 2025-10-23T18:14:02.120449Z*

tickets.title: Implement SQLAlchemy ORM Models
tickets.notes:

- All database operations use AsyncSession
- Use existing database connection management
- TimescaleDB hypertable for time-series metrics

tickets.title: Implement Playbook Manager
tickets.notes:
Context Playbook is the core of ACE's self-supervised learning:

- Tracks agent strategies, patterns, failures, learnings
- Evolves through delta application
- Version tracking prevents conflicts

---

*Created: 2025-10-12T00:00:00Z*
*Updated: 2025-10-23T18:14:02.120449Z*

tickets.title: Implement Delta Generator
tickets.notes:
Delta Generation is the self-supervised learning core:

- Analyzes execution traces for learnings
- Generates playbook improvement suggestions
- Uses cost-effective gpt-4o-mini model
- Target: <$150/month for 100 agents

---

*Created: 2025-10-12T00:00:00Z*
*Updated: 2025-10-23T18:14:02.120449Z*

tickets.title: Implement Simple Curator
tickets.notes:
Simple Curator replaces full reflection loop:
- Confidence-threshold filtering (Phase 1 approach)
- Default threshold: 0.8 (80% confidence)
- Rejected deltas logged for analysis
- Phase 2 may add advanced curation

- Automatic cleanup prevents disk space issues
- Ready for integration with TrainingJobManager

tickets.title: Data Export API
tickets.notes:
- Phase 1: Returns empty results as trajectories are simulated, not stored in DB
- Phase 2: Will return actual trajectories from PostgreSQL with full filtering
- Authorization checks (data_export permission) deferred to Phase 2
- Ready for integration in FLOW-019 (Integration Tests Phase 2)

*Created: unknown*
*Updated: unknown*

tickets.title: Multi-Step Credit Assignment
tickets.notes:
- Default gamma=0.99 provides strong temporal signal without over-discounting
- Per-step advantages currently computed but not yet used in policy updates (trajectory-level advantages used instead)
- Future enhancement: Per-step policy gradients for finer-grained updates
- Convergence benchmark deferred to integration testing phase (FLOW-019)

---

*Created: unknown*
*Updated: unknown*

tickets.title: Training Job Scheduling
tickets.notes:
- Phase 1: Basic Redis queue integration without persistent job storage
- Phase 2: Full PostgreSQL integration for job queue persistence (FLOW-019)
- Performance tests created but require Redis server for execution
- HPA requires Prometheus custom metrics adapter for queue depth metric
- Default pool size recommendation: 5-10 workers for development, 20-50 for production

tickets.title: Multi-Provider LLM Client Service Implementation
tickets.notes:
This is a foundational service for AgentCore that enables all agent operations requiring LLM capabilities. Priority P0 as Phase 1 component.

**Key Strategic Value:**
- Reduces vendor lock-in through provider abstraction
- Enables 30% cost reduction through intelligent model selection
- Provides A2A protocol-native LLM operations with distributed tracing
- Foundation for future intelligent agent capabilities

---

*Created: 2025-10-24T22:47:19.602397+00:00*
*Updated: 2025-10-24T22:47:19.602397+00:00*

tickets.title: Coordination Service with REP Implementation
tickets.notes:
Phase 3 component that enhances existing MessageRouter with intelligent coordination. Can be implemented independently but provides most value after LLM-001 and memory service are operational. Priority P1 as enhancement rather than foundational requirement.

**Performance Targets**:
- Signal registration: <5ms (p95)
- Routing score retrieval: <2ms (p95)
- Optimal agent selection: <10ms for 100 candidates (p95)
- Support 1,000 agents with coordination states
- Handle 10,000 signals per second

**Plan Reference**: `docs/specs/coordination-service/plan.md`
